Package org.nineml.coffeegrinder.util

Class GrammarCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nineml.coffeegrinder.util.GrammarCompiler
  • public class GrammarCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    Store and retrieve CoffeeGrinder grammar files.

    The compile(org.nineml.coffeegrinder.parser.ParserGrammar) method will return a string representation for a grammar that can be loaded with the parse(java.io.File) method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct a grammar compiler with default parser options.

        public void compile​(ParserGrammar grammar,

      • parse

        public SourceGrammar parse​(java.io.File compiled)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Parse a compiled grammar to reconstruct a ParserGrammar object.
        Parameters:
        compiled - A file containing a grammar
        Returns:
        The grammar stored in the compiled file
        Throws:
        GrammarException - if there are errors in the compiled form
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the file is null

      • parse

        public SourceGrammar parse​(java.io.InputStream compiled,
                           java.lang.String systemId)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Parse a compiled grammar to reconstruct a ParserGrammar object.
        Parameters:
        compiled - A file containing a grammar
        systemId - the systemId of the grammar file
        Returns:
        The grammar stored in the compiled file
        Throws:
        GrammarException - if there are errors in the compiled form
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the file is null

      • parse

        public SourceGrammar parse​(java.lang.String input)
        Parse a compiled grammar to reconstruct a ParserGrammar object.
        Parameters:
        input - A string containing a compiled grammar
        Returns:
        The grammar stored in the compiled file
        Throws:
        GrammarException - if there are errors in the compiled form
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the input is null
